patterns: how do I reset my password?
responses: To reset your password, click on 'Forgot Password' on the login screen.
You can reset your password using the password recovery link sent to your email.
Please follow the instructions in the email to change your password.

patterns: how do I request a refund?
can I get my money back?
I want to cancel and get a refund
responses: Our refund policy allows you to request a refund within 7 days of purchase.
To get a refund, please fill out the refund form on our support page.
Yes, you can request a refund by contacting our customer service team.

patterns: I need help with my account
responses: Please try logging out and logging back in again.
If your account is locked, use the 'Forgot Password' option.
You can contact support for further help with your account issues.
You can track your order from the 'My Orders' section on our website.
Please enter your tracking number to check the order status.
Weâ€™ve sent a tracking link to your registered email address.

patterns: I want to cancel my subscription
responses: You can cancel your subscription from the 'Subscription Settings' page.
Go to 'Account Settings' and choose 'Cancel Subscription'.
Please contact support if you're unable to cancel the subscription yourself.
